description.value:
Made of cobalt-colored steel rings that flow down the entire length of the garment, this +1 resilient chain mail includes an armored face covering. The armor is said to be based on the same armor once worn by Azure Leopard, one of Old-Mage Jatembe's magic warriors.

Activate 2 command, envision

Frequency once per day

Effect You call upon the ferocity and grace of the leopard. The armor's rings flatten out to become a solid piece of flexible armor. You gain a +2 item bonus to Stealth checks and Intimidation checks to @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.actionspf2e.Item.Demoralize], but take a -2 penalty to Diplomacy and Society checks.

This lasts for 1 hour, but you can Activate the armor again to revert it back to its original form.

@UUID[Compendium.pf2e.equipment-effects.Item.Effect: Leopard's Armor]
